questions.question: Do you have any of the following with the tummy pain?
answers: You've got diarrhoea and you're being sick
You're bleeding from your back passage or have blood in your poo
You've got groin pain or swelling

questions.question: How bad is the pain?
answers: So bad that you can't think or do anything else
It's bad enough to affect daily life
You feel it, but carry on as usual

questions.question: Have you got a severe ripping or tearing pain in your chest or back that came on suddenly?
questions.help: This pain is intense and comes on out of the blue, it's not pain caused by coughing or a chest infection. It's not an aching, stinging or crushing pain.
answers: Yes - it's a sudden ripping or tearing pain
I have a different type of pain

questions.question: Has a doctor told you that you have either of the following?
Do you feel so ill that you can't think of anything else?
questions.help: For example, you feel worse than you've ever felt in your life and you have a feeling that something is very wrong.
answers: I'm not sure I feel that ill
